BasicInfo.short: Somansa is a global leader in Data Security and Compliance solutions designed to protect valuable company information from leakage.

Products.name: Somansa Privacy-i (Endpoint DLP)
Products.description: Somansa Privacy-i is an Endpoint (DLP) solution to protect sensitive data stored in desktops, laptops and servers.

Products.name: Somansa Mail-i (Network DLP)
Products.description: Somansa Mail-i is a network DLP solution to monitor, discover, and protect data in motion.
